text: Lady Pamela Carmen Louise Hicks Cohen, Claire, "Lady Pamela Hicks, the unlikely 'poshcaster' spilling royal secrets", The Daily Telegraph, 5 October 2019. (n√©e Mountbatten; born 19 April 1929) is a British aristocrat. She is a relative of the British royal family. She is the younger daughter of Louis Mountbatten, 1st Earl Mountbatten of Burma and Edwina Ashley. Through her father, Lady Pamela is a first cousin of Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, and a grandniece of the last Empress of Russia, Alexandra Feodorovna. She was a bridesmaid and later as a lady-in-waiting to Queen Elizabeth II. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:British nobility
title: Lady Pamela Hicks
